transcript_chunks.text: blessing you just got a code for Mortal Kombat you played 10 hours you finish the campaign I did what are your thoughts so far the campaign's really fun it's a lot of what you'd expect out of a new Mortal Kombat game right really good cinematics really good visuals they're harkening back to a lot of PS2 Mortal Kombat era which doesn't get a lot of love uh very specific references actually had me really excited and had me very giddy if you played Immortal combat or even if even you've watched a Mortal Kombat story you know what you're getting out of the narrative I wish that they veered off the beaten path a little bit more with some of these story beasts that we usually get with Mortal Kombat the new Cameo system definitely helps differentiate the gameplay from stuff that we've gotten recently so I might be in the middle of a combo as Scorpion and I call upon Jax to come through and help me extend my combo moments like that keep it entertaining keep it fresh all in all I had a really

so I might be in the middle of a combo as Scorpion and I call upon Jax to come through and help me extend my combo moments like that keep it entertaining keep it fresh all in all I had a really good time I think this is a Moral Combat story that a lot of people are going to enjoy so positive I'm very positive
